Destiny is a man made concept where certain things are going to happen and we cant stop it.destiny appears to exist to the common man.yes in a society like in congo if u wish to be a world class surgeon then it is not going to happen as such facilities to train u hardly exist in congo.so u have to go to another country say us or uk to train properly in a med school. See in the universe u are just another creature like reptiles insects trying to survive. No matter how much intelligent and purposeful and dedicated you feel in life you are just a dot in the existence. And yeah god and devil doesnt exist. Rationally Chance or probablities exists.chance or probabilities could be beneficial or harm for your existence.but chance is not set in stone before your birth. If u give a med post grad exam to get a radiodiagnosis…you could miss it by 2 or 3 ranks only to settle for other subjects.and this could repeat again and again.but this depends on multiple factors including your performance on the exam day.if u missed radiodiagnosis it means we need to open more seats in that subject.it doesnt mean u r destined to fail at getting radiodiagnosis its just ur sentiment.
Many people believe in possible futures. The question is which future are you going to work towards achieving, and what the benefits and costs required to do so are.
